title: TINY TALE
abstract: We often forgot the joyful from the little happiness that we like in life.we like to overcomplicate things in life, that makes us likely feels worried and donâ€™t find our own happiness within or around us. In this project we are hoping to get everyone to be happy with the little things around you including your past, culture, jobs, etc. This way people can give a positive atmosphere to individuals and people around us from our moral message through our short 3D animation.
contributors: Prof. Hong-sik Pak, MFA (Advisor 1); Prof. Balgum Song, MFA. (Advisor 2)
